solution_line_template: The truck tank has {truck_current_gallons} gallons in it because {truck_tank_capacity} x {truck_fill_fraction} = <<{truck_tank_capacity}*{truck_fill_fraction}={truck_current_gallons}>>{truck_current_gallons}
The car tank has {car_current_gallons} gallons in it because {car_tank_capacity} x ({car_fill_fraction}) = <<{car_tank_capacity}*({car_fill_fraction})={car_current_gallons}>>{car_current_gallons}

She needs to add {gallons_to_add_truck} gallons to the truck because {truck_tank_capacity} - {truck_current_gallons} = <<{truck_tank_capacity}-{truck_current_gallons}={gallons_to_add_truck}>>{gallons_to_add_truck}
She needs to add {gallons_to_add_car} gallons to the car because {car_tank_capacity} - {car_current_gallons} = <<{car_tank_capacity}-{car_current_gallons}={gallons_to_add_car}>>{gallons_to_add_car}

She needs to add {total_gallons_to_add} gallons in total because {gallons_to_add_truck} + {gallons_to_add_car} = <<{gallons_to_add_truck}+{gallons_to_add_car}={total_gallons_to_add}>>{total_gallons_to_add}
